mapper.select:
SELECT W.PLAN_ID AS planId, W.TITLE AS title,W.BEGIN_TIME AS beginTime,W.END_TIME AS endTime,W.STATUS AS status,W.PLAN_TYPE AS planType, W.HOLD_USER AS holdUser,(SELECT TEMP.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO TEMP WHERE TEMP.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND TEMP.ACCOUNT_ID=W.HOLD_USER) AS holdUserName, W.SUP_USER AS supUser,(SELECT TEMP1.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO TEMP1 WHERE TEMP1.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND TEMP1.ACCOUNT_ID=W.SUP_USER) AS supUserName FROM WORK_PLAN W LEFT JOIN USER_INFO U ON W.ORG_ID=U.ORG_ID AND W.CREATE_USER=U.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE W.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND W.BEGIN_TIME = CURRENT_DATE()
AND W.TITLE LIKE#{search}

SELECT W.PLAN_ID AS planId, W.TITLE AS title,W.BEGIN_TIME AS beginTime,W.END_TIME AS endTime,W.STATUS AS status,W.PLAN_TYPE AS planType, W.HOLD_USER AS holdUser,(SELECT TEMP.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO TEMP WHERE TEMP.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND TEMP.ACCOUNT_ID=W.HOLD_USER) AS holdUserName, W.SUP_USER AS supUser,(SELECT TEMP1.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO TEMP1 WHERE TEMP1.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND TEMP1.ACCOUNT_ID=W.SUP_USER) AS supUserName FROM WORK_PLAN W LEFT JOIN USER_INFO U ON W.ORG_ID=U.ORG_ID AND W.CREATE_USER=U.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE W.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND LEFT(W.BEGIN_TIME,7) = LEFT(CURRENT_DATE(),7)
AND W.TITLE LIKE#{search}
